Author: PTCSuccessBlog
Title: [ANN] EARN PROFITS DAILY - GET A 10,000 TOKEN BONUS - OVER 50K ALREADY RAISED
Body: WELCOME TO CROWD CRYPTO FUND THE META-PLATFORM FOR INVESTING, LENDING & CROWDFUNDING  http://www.CrowdCryptoFund.com/  Crowd Crypto Fund PRE-SALE (9 Nov - 20 Nov, 2017) 0.00015 BTC per token  Crowd Crypto Fund ICO (21 Nov - 31 Dec, 2017) 0.00075 BTC per token  THE PRESALE IS OPEN NOW GET IN EARLY BEFORE THE ICO OFFICIALLY OPENS  CrowdCryptoFund is built to support two platforms, “Investing and Lending” and “CrowdFunding”.  BENEFIT # 1 - Profit from Trading in CrowdCrypto  As an early adopter investor, this will be a great time for you to invest and get early profits before the platform is open to the general public in January 2018. Our investment goal with the CrowdCrypto token is to gradually increase its value to surpass US $150.00 before December 2018. By being an early adopter, you will be in a prime position to earn the most amount of profit from trading with our token.  BENEFIT # 2 - Profit with Daily Interest from Lending  Our Investing and Lending platform runs on our very own “proprietary volatility software and trading bot”. As an investor, you can lend CrowdCrypto exclusively to our platform and profit on a daily basis. There are four lending options for you to choose from. Upon the completion of each investment term, you will get your capital back to remove from the CrowdCrypto lending platform or optionally reinvest back into the lending platform to continue getting profits daily.  BENEFIT # 3 - Profit from Inviting Other Investors (Affiliate Platform)  As an investor, we would like to give you an additional incentive to spread the word about CrowdCryptoFund and grow our investing community. Our “Affiliate Platform” will be attached to our “Investing and Lending Platform. This will be a great way for you to earn additional BitCoins for every deposit made to the “Investing and Lending Platform” by your affiliates. Our Affiliate Platform runs seven levels deep.  BENEFIT # 4 - Get Bonuses from our Investing and Lending Platform  Investors who take part in our pre-sale and ICO AND invest US$500 or more worth of BTC (at the time of purchase) will receive an extra 10,000 CrowdCrypto tokens. This will be given to you as a “Thank You” for being a serious early adopter in the CrowdCryptoFund platform. You can use these tokens for trading and lending purposes when the platform opens.  READ THE INVESTMENT GUIDE AND WHITE PAPER AT http://www.CrowdCryptoFund.com/
